existing_features.title: Add a colored box border around the notes field in the patient card and make the notes field always visible (not collapsible) so it stands out more
Add a purple colored box border around the Histo (histopathology) task in the patient card task checklist
Add a blue colored box border around the Imaging task in the patient card task checklist
Add an orange colored box border around the presenting complaint field in the patient card
Add the species information displayed in a rounded box badge below the medical record number field in the patient card

new_feature_requests.summary: Add color boxes around fields in patient card: notes (always visible), Histo task (purple), Imaging task (blue), presenting complaint (orange); add species in rounded box below medical record number

projectName: Add colored boxes and species badge to patient card
